title: E-commerce Website
subTitle: A Fully fledged E-Commerce application made using NextJS Framework with various functionalities. Sendgrid API is used for Email intimation.Made with - NextJS, MongoDB, NodeJS and Sendgrid API.

title: React E-Commerce
subTitle: A Simple React based Web application with functionality like Products listings & Add to cart. Listed products are fetched through REST API.

title: Speech to Text Converter
subTitle: A Speech to text ConverterMade with - React and NPM packages

title: Microsoft Clone
subTitle: A Clone of Microsoft's Home Page.Made with - HTML, CSS & NextJS
